subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Keylor Navas knocked away a shot by Theofanis Gekas to help Costa Rica prevail on penalty kicks after Greece had tied the game in added time.
snippet: Keylor Navas knocked away a shot by Theofanis Gekas to help Costa Rica prevail on penalty kicks after Greece had tied the game in added time.
